answers.answer: You need to have your dr run a glucosw test
My doc doesn't allow u to be over 134 or else ur considered diabetic!  Ask ur doc maybe they will want a 3 hr!
I did take one. Thats how i got those numbers. They said I was fine, but should I tell them I don't feel like I am?

My highest number was 132 and I was still diagnosed as diabetic. I claimed to be borderline and my doctor said there is no such thing. And she was right. I'm 39w 5d and my baby is 8 lb 5oz according to ultrasound. I never felt diabetic until later and when checking my sugars 4 times a day they will jump up if I'm not careful. (Jumping to about 150 is really high for me). So I'm still not on the extreme end and i still ended up with too much amniotic fluid because of the diabetes. If they won't treat you as diabetic you can always just be conscious of it and count your carbs and watch your sugary food. Stay active. It's a healthy way to be pregnant anyways. :)
Thanks! I just called them and they said to eat like I am diabetic and see what happens. I'm pretty sure I am diabetic

question: Can you be borderline diabetic when pregnant? My baby is not big, I'm 27 weeks and they said 1 I'm at 138. But this pregnancy site I found said 140-200 is diabetic. My body is acting like I am. When I eat sugar I get weak and light headed.
title: hmm?
